name: WPPDEV WooCommerce Order Status
author: WPPluginsDev

sections.description:
This plugin helps you customize WooCommerce Order Status to fit your fulfillment process and delivery workflow.

  • Create new order statuses to fit your fulfillment process.
  • Edit colors and Icons for easy status identification.
  • Send email notifications to clients, admin, suppliers when an order status change occurs.
  • Add buttons in WooCommerce Orders admin’s table to transition to next status.
  • Show custom order status in WooCommerce Reports.
  • Auxiliar reports to forecast the production, manufactory, or suppliers of your e-commerce.

Automatic Install

  1. Click Menu ‘Plugins’ > ‘Add new’ in your WordPress Admin
  2. Search for: wppdev woocommerce order status
  3. Click install button
  4. Visit settings in WooCommerce Menu > Order Status

Manual Install

  1. Click download button in WordPress plugins wppdev woocommerce order status page
  2. Unzip and Upload the contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory in your server
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Admin
  4. Visit settings in WooCommerce Menu > Order Status
sections.faq:
How to get help?

Click on support tab or contact us at WPPluginsDev

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, please contact us for customizations.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Fix null WordPress nonce used to create api requests.

1.1.0

  • Update javascript libraries, fix upgrade issues.

1.0.2

  • Fix translation text-domain.

1.0

  • First stable version.

short_description: Manage core and custom WooCommerce Order Status to fit your order fulfillment process and workflow.

screenshots.caption: Import presets or create your own configuration.
Overview your order status diagram with one click.
Edit slug, icon, color, description and next order statuses. Enable in reports and order's bulk actions.
Send custom emails to your client, supplier, partners, administrators.
Auxiliar Report to check if your stock meets the demand.
